## addBootstrap() function

Adds SDK support to an existing Angular application

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function addBootstrap(options: AddBootstrapSchema): Rule;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  options | <code>AddBootstrapSchema</code> | the schematics object used to describe the applicatiojn |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Rule`

the schematics rule that executes the transform
